features: Multi-symptom relief: Maximum Strength Arthriten offers relief from minor arthritis pain, joint pain, muscle aches, and mobility discomfort. For pain relief that single ingredient formulas may not provide, experience the multi-symptom relief of Arthriten.

Dependable and long-lasting: Arthriten provides hour-after-hour of dependable pain relief from minor arthritis pain symptoms of joint pain, muscle aches & mobility pain. For dependable relief that lasts for up to six hours, choose Maximum Strength Arthriten.

Easy swallow caps: Maximum Strength Arthriten comes in coated speedcaps for an easy-to-swallow formula. Each 2-caplet dose contains 2 maximum strength pain relievers, plus an ingredient to help them work faster and better.

Leading producer: Alva-Amco is a leading U.S. Producer of specialty non-prescription pharmaceuticals, dietary supplements, and skin care products. Alva-Amco has a history of product innovation, quality & consumer satisfaction in over the counter products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With 3 active ingredients, Arthriten provides hour-after-hour of dependable pain relief from minor arthritis pain symptoms. Aspirin Reduce inflammation with 500mg of aspirin per two caplet dose. Acetaminophen Relieve pain fast with 500mg of acetaminophen per two caplet dose. Caffeine Overall pain-relieving action is enhanced with 130mg of caffeine per two caplet dose.

Maximum Strength Pain Relief Arthriten Inflammatory Pain Formula helps temporarily relieve minor arthritis pain, joint pain, muscle aches, and mobility discomfort. Most choices for arthritis try to relieve pain with only a single active ingredient. For pain relief that single ingredient formulas may not provide, experience the multi-symptom relief of Arthriten. The easy-to-swallow coated Arthriten SpeedCaps provide hour-after-hour of dependable relief from minor arthritis pain symptoms. For dependable pain relief that lasts for up to six hours, choose Maximum Strength Arthriten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for shoulder bursitis
reviews.reviewText: Nothing has worked for my pain. It's been years dealing with shoulder bursitis. I've done PT, taken all kinds of meds, use hot and cold packs, used a sling, nothing works. This did it for me. I was almost pain free for a week. Yes, that's how long one bottle lasts if taken as directed (2 pills, twice a day, 28 pills per bottle)I'm going to be buying two this time until I see my doctor and she can prescribe something similar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who would have thought ...
reviews.reviewText: I first purchased Arthriten for my arthritis in a grocery store but had trouble finding it elsewhere. I had severe hip pain and have diabetic neuropathy in my feet and once I started taking the Arthriten, I noticed a big difference in pain relief. It actually works better for me than Gabapentin which I had been taking for my feet. Could not be happier that I finally found something that actually works, so I ordered 2 more bottles from Amazon and received them today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works great!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good product that I will continue to use. However, I will no longer be buying it from Amazon, as they have raised the price significantly since I 1st purchased it. When I say significantly, I mean it has doubled in price. I can now buy it locally much cheaper than I can get it from Amazon. I enjoy the convenience of Amazon, but not to the point where I will pay double for an item. The pain relief it brings is worth the price, so if you can't find it cheaper locally, I would recommend the product. I know prices go up, but not double in a short amount of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this for my knees and it took the pain away. I literally felt like a new person

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No games .They work
reviews.reviewText: I search hard for effective products, usually something natural , I don't trust much and I definitely do not have a lot of money so it better be good, this is , I've had knee that keeps fluid around enough so i go down stairs ackwardly and wow i feel it age in my back and joints course i keep that to myself have to keep the appearance up , that nope i'm not aging, two of these and in a short span of time usually after ive forgot i took them and get up, and realize no knee pain no joint pain, at first i said its a fluke nope these work .they .do . they. work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a simple formula, nothing magical, but it works better than similar products. I came across this in a supermarket in Florida. It worked better than any OTC product I tried in the past. It’s hard to come by so I was happy to see it available on Amazon.

reviews.reviewText: I started to use this because everything else I had tried for my back pain stopped working, i also had Carpal tunnel which it also worked wonders for as well!
